summary: Drakengard3 Zero,I love zero and the game,so I hope she can happness in skyrim.please,make sure to be soft to her.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Lucida Sans Unicode][b]
[img]http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61910-1-1421922879.jpg[/img]

[color=#f4cccc][size=4]I hope you find the mod useful!
I love zero and the game ,so I hope she can happiness in skyrim.
please, make sure to be soft to her.[/size][/color]
[b][size=5]

[color=#ff0000][size=5]ATTENTION:[/size][/color][/b]
[size=3]This mod always needs XP32 Maximum Skeleton [/size]


[color=#ffd966][size=5]DESCRIPTION:[/size][/color]
[size=3]Main protagonist and an expert swords woman. Shepossesses the singing ability. An apathetic woman, she doesn't think much of [/size][size=3]men or the world around her. A flower grows from her right eye; her pink eyes[/size]
[size=3]are poignantly described to be enigmatic in the world of Drakengard.  [/size]
[size=3][img]http://static-4.nexusmods.com/15/mods/110/images/61910-5-1421921889.jpg[/img]
[/size]
[color=#ffd966][size=5]UPDATE:[/size][/color]
[size=4]1[/size][/b][/font][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=4][b].1 [b]UPDATE[/b][/b][/size][/font][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][b][size=4] Skin and perk
[s]1.0 Main flie[/s][u]s[/u][/size]


[color=#ffd966][size=5]BASIC INFO:[/size][/color]
[size=3]Name:Zero[/size]
[size=3]Class:Warrior[/size]
[size=3]Body:UNPB TBBP[/size]
[size=3]Level: She will be synchronized same levels withthe owner.[/size]
[size=3]Location:Temple of Kynareth[/size]


[color=#ffd966][size=5]INSTALLATION:[/size][/color]
[size=3]Use NMM to install it or Extract files to skyrim/data.[/size]
[size=3] 
[/size]
[color=#ffe599][size=5]SPELL[/size][/color]
[size=3]GrandHealing[/size]
[size=3]Call to arms[/size]
[size=3]Healing Hands[/size]
